title: PBE RP points
body:
Okay so I got PBE yesterday and I waited a day for my RP but when I logged in i didn't receive it?

Do you have to be logged into PBE to receive? And what time in OCE does the PBE reset since our time zone is different to NA?

replies.body:
You're probably better off posting on the PBE boards, since your questions are PBE specific and not something a lot of players are going to be able to answer.

https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/
